greeting.title: Welcome to my portfolio
greeting.intro: Hello! My name is Sathana Suganthasri. My parents are from Sri Lanka, and I have a younger brother. I'm a student at the Informatikmittelschule Aarau. I come from Suhr and am currently in my third year in the IMS, where I focus on IT. I have experience with various languages and frameworks, including Windows Forms applications, console apps, ASP.NET Core web APIs, and more. However. I consider myself a helpful, friendly, and respectful person.
